id: Saudis, Other Big Oil Producers Face Pressure to Diversify, IEA Says
paragraph: November 17, 2018Saudi Arabia and other oil-dependent economies have no choice but to diversify their economies as the challenges they face will deepen even if oil prices remain elevated, a report by a top energy body said Wednesday.The study comes as Saudi Arabia—the world’s largest crude exporter—contends with a crisis over the killing of dissident journalist Jamal Khashoggi, which may pose a threat to Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s plan to make the kingdom’s economy less reliant on oil income.WSJ MembershipCustomer ServiceTools & FeaturesAdsMore
